subject: p15659181
History: With recent pneumonia presenting with palpitations, evaluate for pneumonia.
Findings: The lungs are well inflated and clear. The cardiac silhouette is normal. The left hilum appears enlarged. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
Impression: No focal consolidation. Enlarged left hilum which could reflect hilar lymphadenopathy. CT is recommended for further evaluation.
